# ac-check

## Properties

| Property     | Attribute     | Description                            | Type      |
| ------------ | ------------- | -------------------------------------- | --------- |
| `checked`    | `checked`     | The actual checked state.              | `boolean` |
| `disabled`   | `disabled`    | The native disabled mode.              | `boolean` |
| `helperText` | `helper-text` | The helper text to guide the user.     | `string`  |
| `labelLeft`  | `label-left`  | Set the label to the left of checkbox. | `boolean` |
| `label`      | `label`       | The textual label of this field.       | `string`  |
| `name`       | `name`        | The HTML field name.                   | `string`  |
